snippet.title: FX Unit Yuki: The Henshin Engine Trailer - SWITCH | PixelHeart
snippet.description:
👧🤖🌠Set off on a digital journey of epic pixel proportions!
FX Unit Yuki originated on Retro Consoles and is now available for the Nintendo Switch.

Prevent SG Corporation from hacking the JEC video game!
Play as young Yuki Shirakawa, new bêtateuse of the company JEC. Transformed into FX Unit Yuki when she got too close to the FX Engine, she is now able to enter the game and chase the malicious programs of SG Corp and its champion: Ultradrive Unit Geni. Go through the 8 different levels, mixing platform game and shoot’em up, taking care of the many pitfalls, enemies and formidable bosses.

8 levels of hardcore retro action with Power-Ups, Varying Stage Types and Multiple Endings accompanied by an Amazing Sound Track that will send shivers down your spine!
Get Ready For FX-UNIT YUKI !!👧🤖🌠

Add the game to your wish list:

Nintendo Eshop:
Link 🇺🇸 👉 https://bit.ly/45GTiUF
Link 🇫🇷 👉 https://bit.ly/48LxE4d
Link 🇬🇧 👉 https://bit.ly/3tnJn8J
Link 🇯🇵 👉 https://bit.ly/3QpFesX

#FxUnitYuki #Platformer #actiongame  #TheHenshinEngine #Yuki #YukiShirakawa #Sarumaru #Sarupro #webcomics #pixelart #pixelheart #nintendoswitch #switch #nintendoeshop 

Creation by Sarupro: https://sarupro.com/
Publisher: https://www.pixelheart.eu
Artwork by Sarupro
Trailer by Stef Sirrah (https://stefsirrah.com)
